name: Cake Mania: Boom Sugar
description:
Cake Mania - Boom Sugar Features:
-addictive match three causal puzzle
-interesting match three candy adventure
-mouth-watering graphics
-hundreds of candy matching levels
-switch and match three in a row to remove them
-match 5 to create a candy explosion
-endless fun for both kids and adults

Gameplay:
-connect 3 or more candies in a row to remove them
-match 2 special candies to make a big candy pop
-switch and match 3 or more candies for more power ups
-create combos for high score
-complete levels with the help of boosters
